ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics
Class User

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics.AModel<AView>
      ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics.User

public class User
extends AModel<AView>

Holds all the data that the individual user whom is using the application creates/modifies. This includes top-level comments and replies and makes the view availible when the user goes to "My Comments" from the start screen.

setmID

public void setmID(java.lang.String mID)

getInstance

public static User getInstance()
Returns a single instance of the User. This is a lazy implementation and will only create the single instance (if it does not exist) upon request.

Returns:
myself The instance of the current user

testSetup

public void testSetup()
Initialises the user with a test setup. Use and edit this function if the regular implementation of user has a dependency you need to change in order for proper testing.

getProfileID

public java.lang.String getProfileID()
Returns the profile ID associated with this profile

Returns:
The unique profile ID

clearLocalMyComments

public void clearLocalMyComments()
This empties the local hot list of authored comments. This will not clear any comments written to disk it will only clear the hot versions that have been put into the list.

clearLocalMyFavrouties

public void clearLocalMyFavrouties()
This empties the local hot list of favourite comments. This will not clear any comments written to disk it will only clear the hot versions that have been put into the list.

clearLocalMyBookmarks

public void clearLocalMyBookmarks()
This empties the local hot list of bookmarked comments. This will not clear any comments written to disk it will only clear the hot versions that have been put into the list.

readInstallIDFile

public java.lang.String readInstallIDFile()
Messages to read and write dependent files

Returns:
id The ID of the file containing comment

writeInstallFiles

public void writeInstallFiles()
Writes the users install files back to disk. This includes the users unique ID and their post count. This info needs to be stored as it is used to generate unique post ID's for any new comments the user makes. Their Post's ID's is a combination of their ID and their post count.

readPostCount

public java.lang.String readPostCount()
Reads the users post count off disk. This number is used to track how many comments the user has posted. Its most common use is to be used in combination with the user ID to create unique ID's for a users posts.

Returns:
postCount The post count of the user

updatePostCountFile

public void updatePostCountFile()

installFilesExist

public boolean installFilesExist()
Checks if local install files exist. This does a check to see if the files which sound contain the info exist in the applications file system. It does not check that the contents have anything useful in them.

Returns:
boolean If the installation and post count exist

addToMyComments

public void addToMyComments(CommentModel comment)
Adds a comment to the local hot list of User comments. Will notify any views watching the user class and write the list out to disk.

Parameters:
comment - The comment to be added to the local list.

getMyComments

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getMyComments()
Used to get a copy of the array of my comments. Used mostly to display the list in a view.

Returns:
this.mComments The ArrayList of comments.

inBookmarks

public boolean inBookmarks(CommentModel comment)
Checks if the supplied ID is inside the users bookmarks. Most useful for the User Controller to decide if it needs to add a comment ID to the bookmarks array or remove it. Also used by the views to determine if a comment is bookmarked.

Parameters:
ID - The ID of the comment we are checking
Returns:

addBookmark

public void addBookmark(CommentModel comment)
Adds a comment ID to the bookmarks array. Does not check for duplicates.

Parameters:
ID - The comment ID

removeBookmark

public void removeBookmark(CommentModel comment)
Removes a comment ID from the bookmarks array. Does not check to see if it exists before removing just removes IF it exists.

Parameters:
ID - The comment ID

inFavourites

public boolean inFavourites(CommentModel comment)
Checks if the supplied ID is inside the users bookmarks. Most useful for the User Controller to decide if it needs to add a comment ID to the bookmarks array or remove it. Also used by the views to determin if a comment is bookmarked.

Parameters:
ID - The ID of the comment we are checking
Returns:

addFavourite

public void addFavourite(CommentModel comment)
Adds a comment ID to the bookmarks array. Does not check for duplicates.

Parameters:
ID - The comment ID

Parameters:
ID - The comment ID

generateIDString

public java.lang.String generateIDString(CommentModel comment)
Builds a special comment ID for simple storage. This is parentID:CommentID. This allows us to store both as one string then break it apart to get it the individual parts back later.

Parameters:
comment - THe comment
Returns:

breakParentID

public java.lang.String breakParentID(java.lang.String ID)
Breaks up an ID string and returns the parent ID portion. Format is ParentID:CommentID

Parameters:
ID - The full ID String
Returns:
the parent ID

breakID

public java.lang.String breakID(java.lang.String ID)
Breaks up an ID string and returns the comment ID portion. Format is ParentID:CommentID

Parameters:
ID - The full ID String
Returns:
the comment ID

getCurrentLocation

public Location getCurrentLocation()
Used to get the usersCurrentLocation, available at any time. The users Location is optionally used (by default) when a comment is created/edited. Users location is also used any time the application calls a user-location based sorting function If no provider is enabled it returns the users last stored location.

Returns:
User's Current/Last Known Location

getMyBookmarks

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getMyBookmarks()
Returns the array of strings representing the ID's necessary to get the comments in my bookmarks from the web or the cache.

Returns:
Array of the IDs

getMyFavourites

public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getMyFavourites()
Returns the array of strings representing the ID's necessary to get the comments in my favourites from the web or the cache.

Returns:
Array of the IDs

getProfilePic

public Bitmap getProfilePic()
Returns the profile picture associated with this profile. Used to display the profile pic in the UI.

Returns:
A profiles profile picture.

setProfilePic

public void setProfilePic(Bitmap profilePic)
Sets a new profile picture. This is something a user might do for their own profile but should not be able to be done to ones we do not own.

Parameters:
profilePic - The new profile pic

userName - The new username
contactInfo - The new contact Info
bio - The new Bio
profile - The new profile picture

favourite

public void favourite(CommentModel comment)
Used to add OR remove a comment ID from the favourites's list. If the ID exists its removed, else its added.

Parameters:
ID - The comment ID

bookmark

public void bookmark(CommentModel comment)
Used to add OR remove a comment ID from the bookmark's list. If the ID exists its removed, else its added.

Parameters:
ID - The comment ID
